General

What is Ruge?

A framework for generating and executing event-driven tests.

Why Prolog?
  1. Declarative vs. procedural (for the most part)
  2. Excels at 'exploring search space' for valid sequences
  3. Simple data structures rather than static types

Installation

How do I install Ruge?

TBD

Prolog Rule Programming

How do I import RUGE Prolog libraries?

Set file_search_path, e.g.:

user:file_search_path(ruge,'c:/some/where').
:- include(ruge(common)).

In order to avoid hard-coding the path in Prolog code, the path can be retrieved from the environment or as a command-line argument of the form -DRUGE_HOME=path.

user:file_search_path(ruge,'$RUGE_HOME').
:- include(ruge(common)).

Java Rule Execution

How is the RUGE Java component different from the RUGE Prolog component?

The Java component is for executing tests. The RUGE component generates tests.
